evidence.claim: Advanced Clinical Associates utilizes AWS for cloud services including data storage and API management.
The company supports FHIR and HL7 protocols in their health tech solutions for interoperability.
Integration with X12 transaction sets is mentioned for standardized healthcare data exchanges.
Data processing and ETL methods are highlighted in their engineering practices.
Amazon Web Services stacks are part of their infrastructure for scalable applications.

icp.icp_reason: Utilizes X12 for healthcare exchanges and values API automation in their operations.
